#text=I needed to get to the craft store , there was a sale !
#text=Unfortunately , husband had the car and he would be gone a while .
#text=I made sure I had a couple dollars for the fare and walked to the bus stop .
#text=I waited about ten minutes , then the bus came around the corner and stopped at the bench I was sitting .
#text=A few people got off the bus and I stepped through the doors onto the bus .
#text=I smiled at the bus driver and put the money into the machine to pay for my ride .
#text=I took a seat at an open place and looked out the window .
#text=The store I was going to was only a few stops away and when I saw we were close , I pulled the cord to signal to the driver I was ready to get off .
#text=He stopped at the shopping center and I thanked him for the ride as I stepped onto the pavement .
